content:
Great choice! Spring is a perfect time to visit Paris with moderate temperatures and blooming flowers all around. Apart from the famous Paris marathon, here are few other fun activities to do in Paris during Spring:

1. Celebrate May Day - May 1st is a public holiday in France, and on this day, Paris celebrates with flowers, festivals, and parades. 2. Visit Jardin des Serres d’Auteuil - While in Paris in Spring, Jardin des Serres d'Auteuil is a must-visit spot. This beautiful greenhouse hosts a magnificent collection of plants, flowers, and trees. 3. Explore the city on bike - Spring is the perfect weather for going on a bike tour around Paris. You can rent through the city’s bike-sharing program, Vélib', or book a guided bicycle tour. 4. Visit the Paris Plages - Every summer, the city of Paris creates "beaches" along the Seine River. The event is called Paris Plages or Paris Beaches, and usually, it starts from End of July until End of August. 5. Celebrate the Fête de la Musique - On June 21st, Paris celebrates the Fête de la Musique, a city-wide festival of music with free performances and concerts throughout the city. 6. Visit the Fontainebleau Forest - Located just outside of Paris, the Fontainebleau Forest offers scenic walking trails to enjoy the beautiful spring foliage. These are just a few suggestions, but there is plenty to see and do in Paris in the springtime! Enjoy!
